hero.subheadline: Join the K√°li Basin sustainability community. Measurable impact, real results.
impact_counter.title: Our Community in Numbers
impact_counter.subtitle: See the collective power of our engaged community members working together
story_week.title: How Local Collaboration Changed Our Community
story_week.quote: Being part of this community has transformed how we approach local challenges. Together, we've created something truly special that benefits everyone.
story_week.full_story: When I first joined this community initiative, I didn't know what to expect. At the first meeting, our small group gathered to discuss sustainable transportation challenges in our neighborhood. Today, we are more than 50 active members organizing regular cycling patrols, running community gardens, and we've launched a successful waste reduction program. The most important lesson I've learned: local change begins with small steps, but when people come together, the impact becomes truly remarkable. We've seen neighbors become friends, public spaces come alive, and children learn skills that create lifelong values.
story_week.story_book_subtitle: Read inspiring stories from past weeks by members of our community
story_week.past_story_title_1: How I met my neighbors through the K√°li Workshop program
story_week.past_story_quote_1: Through the K√°li Workshop program, I met my neighbors and realized how many common interests we share. We now meet monthly and work together on community development.
story_week.past_story_title_2: Sponsoring the K√°li community garden program
story_week.past_story_author_2: Balaton Highlands Nonprofit Ltd. ‚Ä¢ Local business
story_week.past_story_quote_2: We sponsor the K√°li community garden program and see its positive impact on the region. We're proud to contribute to the sustainable development of the local community.
story_week.past_story_quote_3: Through sustainability programs, children learned the importance of recycling. I'm delighted to see them bringing these values home, and the whole family starting to live more sustainably.

about.title: Building a Sustainable Future
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to make sustainability action accessible, engaging, and effective for individuals, businesses, and communities worldwide.
about.mission_text: To empower every person and organization to take meaningful climate action through gamified challenges, community support, and data-driven insights that make sustainability engaging and achievable.
about.vision_text: A world where sustainable living is the norm, not the exception. Where every individual feels empowered to make a difference and connected to a global community working toward a thriving planet.
about.global_impact_subtitle: Together, we're creating measurable change for our planet
about.values_subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
about.value_accessibility_desc: Making sustainability action accessible to everyone, regardless of background or resources
about.value_community_desc: Building strong communities where people support each other's sustainability journey
about.value_science_desc: All our recommendations are grounded in peer-reviewed climate science
about.value_improvement_desc: Always learning and evolving to maximize positive environmental impact
about.journey_subtitle: Key milestones in building the sustainability platform
about.team_subtitle: Passionate individuals dedicated to climate action
about.ready_subtitle: Join our global community and start your sustainability journey today. Every action counts, and together we can create lasting change.
about.creating_change: Together we're creating measurable change for our planet
about.join_community_text: Join our global community and start your sustainability journey today. Every action counts, and together we can create lasting change.

handprint.methodology.title: Calculation Methodology
handprint.methodology.subtitle: How we calculate your positive environmental impact
handprint.methodology.dialog_desc: Understand the science behind your handprint calculations
handprint.methodology.intro: Our handprint calculator uses internationally recognized emission factors and scientific research to accurately measure your positive environmental impact. All calculations are based on peer-reviewed studies and data from leading environmental organizations.
handprint.methodology.tree_standard_desc: One tree absorbs approximately 21.77 kg of CO‚ÇÇ per year according to the European Environment Agency. We use this as our standard conversion factor.
handprint.methodology.factors_desc: Each activity type uses specific emission factors validated by scientific research
handprint.methodology.energy_desc: Based on average grid emission intensity. Saving 1 kWh of electricity prevents 0.4 kg of CO‚ÇÇ emissions from entering the atmosphere.
handprint.methodology.transport_desc: Calculated as avoided car emissions. Cycling or using public transport instead of driving a car saves 0.21 kg CO‚ÇÇ per kilometer.
handprint.methodology.food_desc: Average CO‚ÇÇ impact of plant-based meals vs. meat-based meals. Choosing sustainable food reduces emissions by approximately 2.5 kg per meal.
handprint.methodology.waste_desc: Recycling prevents emissions from manufacturing new products. Each kilogram of recycled waste saves 2.1 kg CO‚ÇÇ.
handprint.methodology.water_desc: Water treatment and heating energy. Saving water reduces emissions by 0.4 grams of CO‚ÇÇ per liter.
handprint.methodology.example.transport: 15 km by bike instead of car = 3.15 kg CO‚ÇÇ saved
handprint.methodology.example.food: 3 plant-based meals this week = 7.5 kg CO‚ÇÇ saved
handprint.methodology.example.waste: 5 kg waste recycled = 10.5 kg CO‚ÇÇ prevented
handprint.methodology.multipliers_desc: Your impact grows when you inspire others and maintain consistency
handprint.methodology.community_effect_d: When you share your actions and inspire others, your impact multiplies. Studies show that sustainable behaviors spread through social networks.
handprint.methodology.streak_bonus_desc: Maintaining daily sustainable habits creates lasting change. Your streak multiplies your impact as consistency leads to greater results.
handprint.methodology.validation_intro: Our methodology is continuously validated against the latest scientific research:
handprint.methodology.validation_1: Emission factors are updated quarterly based on IEA, EPA, and EEA data
handprint.methodology.validation_2: All calculations undergo peer review by environmental scientists
handprint.methodology.validation_3: Regional adjustments are made for local energy grid compositions
handprint.methodology.validation_4: Conservative estimates ensure we never overstate your impact
handprint.methodology.disclaimer_text: These calculations provide estimates based on average values. Actual CO‚ÇÇ savings may vary depending on specific circumstances, regional factors, and individual behaviors. Our goal is to provide meaningful insights while maintaining scientific accuracy.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_text: Wellagora OG ("we", "us", "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information in accordance with the GDPR and applicable EU data protection laws.
privacy.controller_text:
Wellagora OG
Nastlbergergasse 12
1130 Vienna, Austria
Email: info@wellagora.org
privacy.data_collected_intro: We collect the following types of personal data:
privacy.data_account: Account information (username, password, profile details, preferences)
privacy.data_activity: Activity data (program participation, community interactions, achievements, points)
privacy.data_technical: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information, session data)
privacy.ai_data_collected_intro: When using WellBot AI assistant, we collect:
privacy.ai_third_party_text: WellBot uses the Claude AI model by Anthropic. Conversations are sent to Anthropic servers via encrypted channels. Anthropic follows GDPR-compliant data practices and does not use data to train their models. Anthropic's privacy policy: https://www.anthropic.com/privacy
privacy.ai_retention_text: AI conversations are retained for 90 days for service quality purposes. Upon account deletion, AI conversation history is deleted within 30 days.
privacy.creator_ownership_text: You retain copyright of uploaded content. By uploading, you grant Wellagora a non-exclusive, revocable license to display content on the platform, use for community purposes, and promote the service.
privacy.creator_moderation_text: Uploaded content is moderated to ensure compliance with community guidelines. We reserve the right to remove violating content without prior notice.
privacy.creator_visibility_text: Public posts are visible to all users. You can control whether your content is public or restricted in your profile settings.
privacy.creator_retention_text: User content is retained until account deletion. Upon deletion, content is anonymized or deleted within 30 days, unless legal obligations require retention.
privacy.cookies_intro: Our website uses cookies for functionality and to improve your experience. We categorize cookies into three types:
privacy.cookies_essential_text: Required for website operation. Includes login session, security tokens, and basic settings. The website cannot function properly without these.
privacy.cookies_functional_text: Remember your preferences (e.g., language, theme) for a better user experience. Optional but enhance browsing experience.
privacy.cookies_analytics_text: Help us understand how visitors use our website. We collect anonymized usage data for improvement purposes.
privacy.purpose_service: To provide and maintain our platform services
privacy.purpose_communication: To communicate with you about programs, updates, and support
privacy.purpose_improvement: To improve and personalize your experience
privacy.purpose_security: To ensure platform security and prevent fraud
privacy.legal_consent: Consent: You have given explicit consent for processing
privacy.legal_contract: Contract: Processing is necessary to fulfill our contract with you
privacy.legal_legitimate: Legitimate interests: Processing is necessary for our legitimate business interests
privacy.legal_obligation: Legal obligation: Processing is required by law
privacy.sharing_intro: We may share your data with:
privacy.sharing_providers: Service providers who assist in operating the platform (e.g., hosting, email services)
privacy.sharing_ai_provider: Anthropic (AI provider) - only for AI assistant operation, with GDPR-compliant data handling
privacy.sharing_legal: Law enforcement or regulatory authorities when required by law
privacy.sharing_consent: Third parties with your explicit consent
privacy.retention_text: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law. Account data: until account deletion. Transaction data: 7 years (legal requirement). AI conversations: 90 days. When no longer needed, data is securely deleted or anonymized.
privacy.rights_intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.right_access: Request access to your personal data and obtain a copy
privacy.right_rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
privacy.right_erasure: Request deletion of your personal data ("right to be forgotten")
privacy.right_restriction: Request restriction of data processing under certain circumstances
privacy.right_portability: Request your data in a structured, machine-readable format
privacy.right_object: Object to processing of your personal data based on legitimate interests
privacy.right_withdraw: Withdraw consent at any time without affecting lawfulness of prior processing
privacy.rights_exercise: To exercise your rights, please contact us at info@wellagora.org. We will respond within 30 days.
privacy.authority_intro: If you believe your data is being processed unlawfully, you may file a complaint with the competent data protection authority. Our company is headquartered in Austria, so the competent authority is:
privacy.security_text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data. These include: encrypted data transmission (TLS/SSL), secure password storage, access restrictions, regular security updates and audits.
privacy.changes_text: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy. We will notify you of significant changes via email or platform notification. Continued use after changes indicates acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy.contact_text: If you have questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:

sponsor_landing.hero_quote: Support local initiatives, strengthen the community, and showcase your values.
sponsor_landing.how_it_works_subtitle: Become a community supporter in 4 simple steps
sponsor_landing.step_2_desc: Automatically every month. They never expire!
sponsor_landing.step_3_desc: Choose initiatives close to your heart.
sponsor_landing.step_4_desc: Your logo appears on supported programs.
sponsor_landing.credit_explanation: 1 credit = 1 month of sponsor presence on a chosen program.
sponsor_landing.pricing_subtitle: All packages include monthly renewable credits
sponsor_landing.faq_subtitle: Answers to the most common questions
sponsor_landing.faq_1_q: What happens if I don't use my credits?
sponsor_landing.faq_1_a: Credits never expire and carry over to the following months. No loss!
sponsor_landing.faq_2_q: When should I choose an annual subscription?
sponsor_landing.faq_2_a: With an annual subscription, you get ~17% discount and bonus credits. If you're planning long-term, this is the best choice.
sponsor_landing.faq_3_a: Your logo appears on the supported program page, in the impact summary, and in community news.
sponsor_landing.faq_4_q: How do I support an ongoing program?
sponsor_landing.faq_4_a: Choose how many months you want to support (1-12 months). Each month = 1 credit.
sponsor_landing.faq_5_a: Yes, you can change packages anytime. Your existing credits remain and transfer to the new package.
sponsor_landing.final_cta_subtitle: Join the community supporters and help local initiatives succeed.
